title: Server Status
description: Information about the API server status.

status.description: The current status of the server.

maintenance.description: True if the server is in maintenance mode.

min_client_version.description: The minimum required client version to connect.

upgrade_required.description: True if a mandatory client upgrade is required.

message.description: Message of the day or status detail.

generated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when this status was generated.
